original_text: Then he took the Book of the Covenant and read it in the hearing of the people. And they said, “All that the Lord has spoken we will do, and we will be obedient.”
korean_text: 언약서를 가져다가 백성에게 낭독하여 듣게 하니 그들이 이르되 여호와의 모든 말씀을 우리가 준행하리이다

sentences.original_text: Then he took the Book of the Covenant
and read it in the hearing of the people.
All that the Lord has spoken we will do,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 말씀하신 모든 것을 우리가 행하겠고
